This rich and aromatic meal is one of the most delicious amongst the rice dishes. Tender morsels of steak cubes cooked in a beautifully thickened spicy gravy, served over fragrant basmati rice makes the meal one to savor.

This is so good we\'d be surprised if this chicken fillet recipe doesn\'t become a firm favourite. Save it to your My Good Food collection and enjoy.
The potatoes in this recipe take on the spicy flavours beautifully - our idea of the perfect veggie supper
A great one-pot rice dish that can still be served up a few days later, perfect for leftovers
